name: Ricochet Heroes
description:
Freshly updated from Ludum Dare 31 (where it won #16 overall and #5 in the fun category) and made in 72 hours.

Ricochet Heroes is an unlikely combination of two unexpected genres: Pinball and RPG. Fling your heroes, bounce evil monsters, and recruit new heroes for some multiball madness. And of course, save some princesses!

Controls:
Click + Hold : Fling Heroes
WASD/Arrow Keys : Tilt (Push heroes in a certain direction)
